mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map of acreage on Dick's Branch in Albermarle County made by William Woods to settle a boundary dispute between John Carter and James Monroe; Monroe received the land from Short; attached is a receipt for five dollars from Wood to Jefferson for the surveying fee.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1816 April 9, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to W[illiam] Short, n.p.
